Now, let's create an Admin dashboard page for user management:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import React, { useState } from 'react';
+ import DashboardLayout from '@/components/layout/DashboardLayout';
+ 
+ interface User {
+   id: string;
+   name: string;
+   email: string;
+   role: string;
+   status: 'active' | 'pending' | 'suspended';
+   joinedDate: string;
+ }
+ 
+ const AdminUsersPage = () => {
+   // In a real app, this would come from an API
+   const [users, setUsers] = useState<User[]>([
+     {
+       id: '1',
+       name: 'John Doe',
+       email: 'john@example.com',
+       role: 'USER',
+       status: 'active',
+       joinedDate: '2023-01-15',
+     },
+     {
+       id: '2',
+       name: 'Jane Smith',
+       email: 'jane@example.com',
+       role: 'CONTRIBUTOR',
+       status: 'active',
+       joinedDate: '2023-02-20',
+     },
+     {
+       id: '3',
+       name: 'Robert Johnson',
+       email: 'robert@example.com',
+       role: 'ADMIN',
+       status: 'active',
+       joinedDate: '2023-03-10',
+     },
+     {
+       id: '4',
+       name: 'Emily Davis',
+       email: 'emily@example.com',
+       role: 'USER',
+       status: 'pending',
+       joinedDate: '2023-04-05',
+     },
+     {
+       id: '5',
+       name: 'Michael Wilson',
+       email: 'michael@example.com',
+       role: 'CONTRIBUTOR',
+       status: 'suspended',
+       joinedDate: '2023-05-12',
+     },
+   ]);
+ 
+   const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
+   const [roleFilter, setRoleFilter] = useState('');
+   const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('');
+ 
+   // Filter users based on search term and filters
+   const filteredUsers = users.filter((user) => {
+     const matchesSearch =
+       user.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ||
+       user.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase());
+     
+     const matchesRole = roleFilter ? user.role === roleFilter : true;
+     const matchesStatus = statusFilter ? user.status === statusFilter : true;
+     
+     return matchesSearch && matchesRole && matchesStatus;
+   });
+ 
+   const handleRoleChange = (userId: string, newRole: string) => {
+     setUsers(
+       users.map((user) =>
+         user.id === userId ? { ...user, role: newRole } : user
+       )
+     );
+   };
+ 
+   const handleStatusChange = (userId: string, newStatus: 'active' | 'pending' | 'suspended') => {
+     setUsers(
+       users.map((user) =>
+         user.id === userId ? { ...user, status: newStatus } : user
+       )
+     );
+   };
+ 
+   const getStatusBadgeClass = (status: string) => {
+     switch (status) {
+       case 'active':
+         return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800';
+       case 'pending':
+         return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800';
+       case 'suspended':
+         return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800';
+       default:
+         return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800';
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <DashboardLayout allowedRoles={['ADMIN', 'SUPER_ADMIN']}>
+       <div className="space-y-6">
+         <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800">User Management</h2>
+         
+         {/* Filters */}
+         <div className="bg-white shadow rounded-lg p-6">
+           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
+             <div>
+               <label htmlFor="search" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                 Search
+               </label>
+               <input
+                 type="text"
+                 id="search"
+                 value={searchTerm}
+                 onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
+                 placeholder="Search by name or email"
+                 className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm"
+               />
+             </div>
+             
+             <div>
+               <label htmlFor="role-filter" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                 Filter by Role
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 id="role-filter"
+                 value={roleFilter}
+                 onChange={(e) => setRoleFilter(e.target.value)}
+                 className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm"
+               >
+                 <option value="">All Roles</option>
+                 <option value="USER">User</option>
+                 <option value="CONTRIBUTOR">Contributor</option>
+                 <option value="ADMIN">Admin</option>
+                 <option value="SUPER_ADMIN">Super Admin</option>
+               </select>
+             </div>
+             
+             <div>
+               <label htmlFor="status-filter" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                 Filter by Status
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 id="status-filter"
+                 value={statusFilter}
+                 onChange={(e) => setStatusFilter(e.target.value)}
+                 className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm"
+               >
+                 <option value="">All Statuses</option>
+                 <option value="active">Active</option>
+                 <option value="pending">Pending</option>
+                 <option value="suspended">Suspended</option>
+               </select>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+         
+         {/* Users Table */}
+         <div className="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden rounded-lg">
+           <div className="overflow-x-auto">
+             <table className="min-w-full divide-y divide-gray-200">
+               <thead className="bg-gray-50">
+                 <tr>
+                   <th scope="col" className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
+                     Name
+                   </th>
+                   <th scope="col" className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
+                     Email
+                   </th>
+                   <th scope="col" className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
+                     Role
+                   </th>
+                   <th scope="col" className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
+                     Status
+                   </th>
+                   <th scope="col" className="px-6 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
+                     Joined
+                   </th>
+                   <th scope="col" className="px-6 py-3 text-right text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
+                     Actions
+                   </th>
+                 </tr>
+               </thead>
+               <tbody className="bg-white divide-y divide-gray-200">
+                 {filteredUsers.map((user) => (
+                   <tr key={user.id}>
+                     <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
+                       <div className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">{user.name}</div>
+                     </td>
+                     <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
+                       <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">{user.email}</div>
+                     </td>
+                     <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
+                       <select
+                         value={user.role}
+                         onChange={(e) => handleRoleChange(user.id, e.target.value)}
+                         className="text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500"
+                       >
+                         <option value="USER">User</option>
+                         <option value="CONTRIBUTOR">Contributor</option>
+                         <option value="ADMIN">Admin</option>
+                         <option value="SUPER_ADMIN">Super Admin</option>
+                       </select>
+                     </td>
+                     <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap">
+                       <span className={`px-2 inline-flex text-xs leading-5 font-semibold rounded-full ${getStatusBadgeClass(user.status)}`}>
+                         {user.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + user.status.slice(1)}
+                       </span>
+                     </td>
+                     <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-sm text-gray-500">
+                       {new Date(user.joinedDate).toLocaleDateString()}
+                     </td>
+                     <td className="px-6 py-4 whitespace-nowrap text-right text-sm font-medium">
+                       <select
+                         value={user.status}
+                         onChange={(e) => handleStatusChange(user.id, e.target.value as 'active' | 'pending' | 'suspended')}
+                         className="text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 mr-2"
+                       >
+                         <option value="active">Set Active</option>
+                         <option value="pending">Set Pending</option>
+                         <option value="suspended">Set Suspended</option>
+                       </select>
+                       <button 
+                         className="text-indigo-600 hover:text-indigo-900"
+                         onClick={() => alert(`View profile for ${user.name}`)}
+                       >
+                         View
+                       </button>
+                     </td>
+                   </tr>
+                 ))}
+               </tbody>
+             </table>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </DashboardLayout>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default AdminUsersPage; 
```

Let me try to reapply the system settings page:

```diff
-  
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import React, { useState } from 'react';
+ import DashboardLayout from '@/components/layout/DashboardLayout';
+ import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
+ import * as z from 'zod';
+ 
+ // Form validation schema
+ const settingsSchema = z.object({
+   siteName: z.string().min(3, 'Site name must be at least 3 characters'),
+   siteDescription: z.string().min(10, 'Site description must be at least 10 characters'),
+   contactEmail: z.string().email('Please enter a valid email address'),
+   maxUploadSize: z.coerce.number().min(1, 'Upload size must be at least 1MB'),
+   maxUploadsPerDay: z.coerce.number().min(1, 'Value must be at least 1'),
+   approvalRequired: z.boolean(),
+   allowComments: z.boolean(),
+   maintenanceMode: z.boolean(),
+ });
+ 
+ type SettingsFormValues = z.infer<typeof settingsSchema>;
+ 
+ const SystemSettingsPage = () => {
+   const [saving, setSaving] = useState(false);
+   const [saveSuccess, setSaveSuccess] = useState(false);
+ 
+   const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm<SettingsFormValues>({
+     resolver: zodResolver(settingsSchema),
+     defaultValues: {
+       siteName: 'KlickStock',
+       siteDescription: 'A free photo-sharing platform for photographers and enthusiasts',
+       contactEmail: 'admin@klickstock.com',
+       maxUploadSize: 10,
+       maxUploadsPerDay: 20,
+       approvalRequired: true,
+       allowComments: true,
+       maintenanceMode: false,
+     }
+   });
+ 
+   const onSubmit = async (data: SettingsFormValues) => {
+     setSaving(true);
+     setSaveSuccess(false);
+     
+     try {
+       // Simulate API call
+       await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500));
+       console.log('Settings updated:', data);
+       setSaveSuccess(true);
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Failed to save settings:', error);
+     } finally {
+       setSaving(false);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <DashboardLayout allowedRoles={['SUPER_ADMIN']}>
+       <div className="space-y-6">
+         <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800">System Settings</h2>
+         
+         <div className="bg-white shadow rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
+           <div className="p-6">
+             <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-6">
+               <div className="grid grid-cols-1 gap-y-6 gap-x-4 sm:grid-cols-6">
+                 {/* Site Settings */}
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-6">
+                   <h3 className="text-lg font-medium leading-6 text-gray-900">Site Settings</h3>
+                   <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
+                     Basic information about your website.
+                   </p>
+                 </div>
+                 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-3">
+                   <label htmlFor="siteName" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                     Site Name
+                   </label>
+                   <div className="mt-1">
+                     <input
+                       type="text"
+                       id="siteName"
+                       {...register('siteName')}
+                       className="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md"
+                     />
+                     {errors.siteName && (
+                       <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.siteName.message}</p>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-3">
+                   <label htmlFor="contactEmail" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                     Contact Email
+                   </label>
+                   <div className="mt-1">
+                     <input
+                       type="email"
+                       id="contactEmail"
+                       {...register('contactEmail')}
+                       className="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md"
+                     />
+                     {errors.contactEmail && (
+                       <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.contactEmail.message}</p>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-6">
+                   <label htmlFor="siteDescription" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                     Site Description
+                   </label>
+                   <div className="mt-1">
+                     <textarea
+                       id="siteDescription"
+                       rows={3}
+                       {...register('siteDescription')}
+                       className="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md"
+                     />
+                     {errors.siteDescription && (
+                       <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.siteDescription.message}</p>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 {/* Upload Settings */}
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-6 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
+                   <h3 className="text-lg font-medium leading-6 text-gray-900">Upload Settings</h3>
+                   <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
+                     Configure how users can upload photos to the platform.
+                   </p>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-3">
+                   <label htmlFor="maxUploadSize" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                     Maximum Upload Size (MB)
+                   </label>
+                   <div className="mt-1">
+                     <input
+                       type="number"
+                       id="maxUploadSize"
+                       min="1"
+                       {...register('maxUploadSize')}
+                       className="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md"
+                     />
+                     {errors.maxUploadSize && (
+                       <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.maxUploadSize.message}</p>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-3">
+                   <label htmlFor="maxUploadsPerDay" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                     Maximum Uploads Per Day
+                   </label>
+                   <div className="mt-1">
+                     <input
+                       type="number"
+                       id="maxUploadsPerDay"
+                       min="1"
+                       {...register('maxUploadsPerDay')}
+                       className="shadow-sm focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md"
+                     />
+                     {errors.maxUploadsPerDay && (
+                       <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-red-600">{errors.maxUploadsPerDay.message}</p>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-3">
+                   <div className="relative flex items-start">
+                     <div className="flex items-center h-5">
+                       <input
+                         id="approvalRequired"
+                         type="checkbox"
+                         {...register('approvalRequired')}
+                         className="focus:ring-indigo-500 h-4 w-4 text-indigo-600 border-gray-300 rounded"
+                       />
+                     </div>
+                     <div className="ml-3 text-sm">
+                       <label htmlFor="approvalRequired" className="font-medium text-gray-700">
+                         Require Approval for Uploads
+                       </label>
+                       <p className="text-gray-500">Uploads will need admin approval before being visible.</p>
+                     </div>
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-3">
+                   <div className="relative flex items-start">
+                     <div className="flex items-center h-5">
+                       <input
+                         id="allowComments"
+                         type="checkbox"
+                         {...register('allowComments')}
+                         className="focus:ring-indigo-500 h-4 w-4 text-indigo-600 border-gray-300 rounded"
+                       />
+                     </div>
+                     <div className="ml-3 text-sm">
+                       <label htmlFor="allowComments" className="font-medium text-gray-700">
+                         Allow Comments
+                       </label>
+                       <p className="text-gray-500">Enable comments on photos.</p>
+                     </div>
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 {/* System Settings */}
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-6 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200">
+                   <h3 className="text-lg font-medium leading-6 text-gray-900">System Settings</h3>
+                   <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
+                     Configure advanced system settings.
+                   </p>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <div className="sm:col-span-6">
+                   <div className="relative flex items-start">
+                     <div className="flex items-center h-5">
+                       <input
+                         id="maintenanceMode"
+                         type="checkbox"
+                         {...register('maintenanceMode')}
+                         className="focus:ring-indigo-500 h-4 w-4 text-indigo-600 border-gray-300 rounded"
+                       />
+                     </div>
+                     <div className="ml-3 text-sm">
+                       <label htmlFor="maintenanceMode" className="font-medium text-gray-700">
+                         Maintenance Mode
+                       </label>
+                       <p className="text-gray-500">
+                         When enabled, the site will display a maintenance message to all non-admin users.
+                       </p>
+                     </div>
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+ 
+               <div className="flex justify-end">
+                 {saveSuccess && (
+                   <span className="mr-4 inline-flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm leading-4 font-medium rounded-md text-green-700 bg-green-100">
+                     Settings saved successfully!
+                   </span>
+                 )}
+                 <button
+                   type="submit"
+                   disabled={saving}
+                   className="inline-flex justify-center py-2 px-4 border border-transparent shadow-sm text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 disabled:opacity-50"
+                 >
+                   {saving ? 'Saving...' : 'Save Settings'}
+                 </button>
+               </div>
+             </form>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </DashboardLayout>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default SystemSettingsPage;
```

---

Let's create a "My Photos" page for users to view their uploaded photos:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import React, { useState } from 'react';
+ import DashboardLayout from '@/components/layout/DashboardLayout';
+ 
+ interface Photo {
+   id: string;
+   title: string;
+   imageUrl: string;
+   description: string;
+   category: string;
+   tags: string[];
+   uploadDate: string;
+   views: number;
+   downloads: number;
+   likes: number;
+ }
+ 
+ const MyPhotosPage = () => {
+   // In a real app, this would come from an API
+   const [photos, setPhotos] = useState<Photo[]>([
+     {
+       id: '1',
+       title: 'Mountain Sunset',
+       imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1501785888041-af3ef285b470',
+       description: 'Beautiful sunset over the mountains',
+       category: 'nature',
+       tags: ['sunset', 'mountains', 'landscape'],
+       uploadDate: '2023-05-15',
+       views: 245,
+       downloads: 32,
+       likes: 18,
+     },
+     {
+       id: '2',
+       title: 'Urban Architecture',
+       imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511818966892-d7d671e672a2',
+       description: 'Modern urban architecture with glass facades',
+       category: 'architecture',
+       tags: ['urban', 'building', 'modern'],
+       uploadDate: '2023-06-02',
+       views: 187,
+       downloads: 24,
+       likes: 12,
+     },
+     {
+       id: '3',
+       title: 'Beach Paradise',
+       imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506953823976-52e1fdc0149a',
+       description: 'Tropical beach with palm trees and crystal clear water',
+       category: 'travel',
+       tags: ['beach', 'tropical', 'vacation'],
+       uploadDate: '2023-06-20',
+       views: 312,
+       downloads: 48,
+       likes: 26,
+     },
+     {
+       id: '4',
+       title: 'Coffee Art',
+       imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512568400610-62da28bc8a13',
+       description: 'Latte art in a coffee cup',
+       category: 'food',
+       tags: ['coffee', 'latte', 'drink'],
+       uploadDate: '2023-07-05',
+       views: 165,
+       downloads: 19,
+       likes: 15,
+     },
+     {
+       id: '5',
+       title: 'Winter Forest',
+       imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511735518775-8fac47de224a',
+       description: 'Snow-covered forest with morning light',
+       category: 'nature',
+       tags: ['winter', 'snow', 'forest'],
+       uploadDate: '2023-07-18',
+       views: 198,
+       downloads: 27,
+       likes: 20,
+     },
+   ]);
+ 
+   const [filter, setFilter] = useState('all');
+   const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
+   const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState('newest');
+ 
+   // Apply filters, search, and sorting
+   const filteredPhotos = photos
+     .filter((photo) => {
+       // Filter by category
+       if (filter !== 'all' && photo.category !== filter) {
+         return false;
+       }
+       
+       // Search by title, description, or tags
+       if (searchTerm) {
+         const searchLower = searchTerm.toLowerCase();
+         return (
+           photo.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) ||
+           photo.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower) ||
+           photo.tags.some((tag) => tag.toLowerCase().includes(searchLower))
+         );
+       }
+       
+       return true;
+     })
+     .sort((a, b) => {
+       // Sort by selected criteria
+       switch (sortBy) {
+         case 'newest':
+           return new Date(b.uploadDate).getTime() - new Date(a.uploadDate).getTime();
+         case 'oldest':
+           return new Date(a.uploadDate).getTime() - new Date(b.uploadDate).getTime();
+         case 'most-viewed':
+           return b.views - a.views;
+         case 'most-downloaded':
+           return b.downloads - a.downloads;
+         case 'most-liked':
+           return b.likes - a.likes;
+         default:
+           return 0;
+       }
+     });
+ 
+   const handleDeletePhoto = (id: string) => {
+     if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this photo?')) {
+       setPhotos(photos.filter((photo) => photo.id !== id));
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <DashboardLayout>
+       <div className="space-y-6">
+         <div className="flex flex-col md:flex-row md:items-center md:justify-between">
+           <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800">My Photos</h2>
+           <button
+             onClick={() => alert('Navigate to upload page')}
+             className="mt-4 md:mt-0 px-4 py-2 bg-indigo-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-indigo-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500"
+           >
+             Upload New Photo
+           </button>
+         </div>
+         
+         {/* Filters and Search */}
+         <div className="bg-white shadow rounded-lg p-6">
+           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
+             <div>
+               <label htmlFor="search" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                 Search Photos
+               </label>
+               <input
+                 type="text"
+                 id="search"
+                 value={searchTerm}
+                 onChange={(e) => setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}
+                 placeholder="Search by title, description, or tags"
+                 className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm"
+               />
+             </div>
+             
+             <div>
+               <label htmlFor="category-filter" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                 Filter by Category
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 id="category-filter"
+                 value={filter}
+                 onChange={(e) => setFilter(e.target.value)}
+                 className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm"
+               >
+                 <option value="all">All Categories</option>
+                 <option value="nature">Nature</option>
+                 <option value="architecture">Architecture</option>
+                 <option value="travel">Travel</option>
+                 <option value="food">Food</option>
+                 <option value="people">People</option>
+                 <option value="animals">Animals</option>
+                 <option value="art">Art</option>
+                 <option value="technology">Technology</option>
+               </select>
+             </div>
+             
+             <div>
+               <label htmlFor="sort-by" className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">
+                 Sort By
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 id="sort-by"
+                 value={sortBy}
+                 onChange={(e) => setSortBy(e.target.value)}
+                 className="mt-1 block w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm py-2 px-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-indigo-500 sm:text-sm"
+               >
+                 <option value="newest">Newest First</option>
+                 <option value="oldest">Oldest First</option>
+                 <option value="most-viewed">Most Viewed</option>
+                 <option value="most-downloaded">Most Downloaded</option>
+                 <option value="most-liked">Most Liked</option>
+               </select>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+         
+         {/* Photo Grid */}
+         {filteredPhotos.length === 0 ? (
+           <div className="text-center py-10 bg-white shadow rounded-lg">
+             <svg
+               className="mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-gray-400"
+               fill="none"
+               viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+               stroke="currentColor"
+               aria-hidden="true"
+             >
+               <path
+                 strokeLinecap="round"
+                 strokeLinejoin="round"
+                 strokeWidth={2}
+                 d="M9 13h6m-3-3v6m-9 1V7a2 2 0 012-2h6l2 2h6a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2H5a2 2 0 01-2-2z"
+               />
+             </svg>
+             <h3 className="mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900">No photos found</h3>
+             <p className="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500">
+               {searchTerm || filter !== 'all'
+                 ? 'Try adjusting your search or filter criteria.'
+                 : 'Get started by uploading your first photo.'}
+             </p>
+             <div className="mt-6">
+               <button
+                 type="button"
+                 onClick={() => alert('Navigate to upload page')}
+                 className="inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-transparent shadow-sm text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500"
+               >
+                 <svg
+                   className="-ml-1 mr-2 h-5 w-5"
+                   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+                   viewBox="0 0 20 20"
+                   fill="currentColor"
+                   aria-hidden="true"
+                 >
+                   <path
+                     fillRule="evenodd"
+                     d="M10 5a1 1 0 011 1v3h3a1 1 0 110 2h-3v3a1 1 0 11-2 0v-3H6a1 1 0 110-2h3V6a1 1 0 011-1z"
+                     clipRule="evenodd"
+                   />
+                 </svg>
+                 Upload a photo
+               </button>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         ) : (
+           <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
+             {filteredPhotos.map((photo) => (
+               <div key={photo.id} className="bg-white shadow rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
+                 <div className="relative pb-[56.25%]">
+                   <img
+                     src={photo.imageUrl}
+                     alt={photo.title}
+                     className="absolute h-full w-full object-cover"
+                   />
+                 </div>
+                 <div className="p-4">
+                   <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold">{photo.title}</h3>
+                   <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mt-1 line-clamp-2">{photo.description}</p>
+                   
+                   <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1 mt-2">
+                     {photo.tags.map((tag) => (
+                       <span
+                         key={tag}
+                         className="bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-xs font-medium px-2 py-0.5 rounded"
+                       >
+                         {tag}
+                       </span>
+                     ))}
+                   </div>
+                   
+                   <div className="mt-3 flex items-center text-sm text-gray-500">
+                     <span>Uploaded: {new Date(photo.uploadDate).toLocaleDateString()}</span>
+                   </div>
+                   
+                   <div className="mt-3 flex items-center justify-between">
+                     <div className="flex space-x-2 text-xs">
+                       <span className="flex items-center">
+                         <svg
+                           className="h-4 w-4 mr-1"
+                           fill="none"
+                           stroke="currentColor"
+                           viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+                           xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+                         >
+                           <path
+                             strokeLinecap="round"
+                             strokeLinejoin="round"
+                             strokeWidth={2}
+                             d="M15 12a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z"
+                           />
+                           <path
+                             strokeLinecap="round"
+                             strokeLinejoin="round"
+                             strokeWidth={2}
+                             d="M2.458 12C3.732 7.943 7.523 5 12 5c4.478 0 8.268 2.943 9.542 7-1.274 4.057-5.064 7-9.542 7-4.477 0-8.268-2.943-9.542-7z"
+                           />
+                         </svg>
+                         {photo.views}
+                       </span>
+                       <span className="flex items-center">
+                         <svg
+                           className="h-4 w-4 mr-1"
+                           fill="none"
+                           stroke="currentColor"
+                           viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+                           xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+                         >
+                           <path
+                             strokeLinecap="round"
+                             strokeLinejoin="round"
+                             strokeWidth={2}
+                             d="M4 16v1a3 3 0 003 3h10a3 3 0 003-3v-1m-4-4l-4 4m0 0l-4-4m4 4V4"
+                           />
+                         </svg>
+                         {photo.downloads}
+                       </span>
+                       <span className="flex items-center">
+                         <svg
+                           className="h-4 w-4 mr-1"
+                           fill="none"
+                           stroke="currentColor"
+                           viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+                           xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+                         >
+                           <path
+                             strokeLinecap="round"
+                             strokeLinejoin="round"
+                             strokeWidth={2}
+                             d="M4.318 6.318a4.5 4.5 0 000 6.364L12 20.364l7.682-7.682a4.5 4.5 0 00-6.364-6.364L12 7.636l-1.318-1.318a4.5 4.5 0 00-6.364 0z"
+                           />
+                         </svg>
+                         {photo.likes}
+                       </span>
+                     </div>
+                     
+                     <div className="flex space-x-2">
+                       <button
+                         onClick={() => alert(`Edit photo: ${photo.title}`)}
+                         className="text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700"
+                       >
+                         <svg
+                           className="h-5 w-5"
+                           fill="none"
+                           stroke="currentColor"
+                           viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+                           xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+                         >
+                           <path
+                             strokeLinecap="round"
+                             strokeLinejoin="round"
+                             strokeWidth={2}
+                             d="M11 5H6a2 2 0 00-2 2v11a2 2 0 002 2h11a2 2 0 002-2v-5m-1.414-9.414a2 2 0 112.828 2.828L11.828 15H9v-2.828l8.586-8.586z"
+                           />
+                         </svg>
+                       </button>
+                       <button
+                         onClick={() => handleDeletePhoto(photo.id)}
+                         className="text-red-500 hover:text-red-700"
+                       >
+                         <svg
+                           className="h-5 w-5"
+                           fill="none"
+                           stroke="currentColor"
+                           viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+                           xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+                         >
+                           <path
+                             strokeLinecap="round"
+                             strokeLinejoin="round"
+                             strokeWidth={2}
+                             d="M19 7l-.867 12.142A2 2 0 0116.138 21H7.862a2 2 0 01-1.995-1.858L5 7m5 4v6m4-6v6m1-10V4a1 1 0 00-1-1h-4a1 1 0 00-1 1v3M4 7h16"
+                           />
+                         </svg>
+                       </button>
+                     </div>
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+             ))}
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </DashboardLayout>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default MyPhotosPage; 
```

Looking at the error logs, I see the issue isn't just with the Header component. Although we fixed the blank line issue in Header.tsx, there's still a server component trying to use client-only functionality.

The error message "This function is not supported in React Server Components. Please only use this export in a Client Component" indicates that there's another component using client-only features without the 'use client' directive.

Let's check your layout component since it's likely using the redux store:

---

The issue is that the ReduxProvider component needs the 'use client' directive since it's using Redux, which is client-side only. Let's add it:

---

```diff
  import React from 'react';
```

---

Read file: components/layout/Footer.tsx

---

The Footer component uses `new Date()` which is a client-side function, so let's add the 'use client' directive to it as well:

---

```diff
+ 'use client';
  import React from 'react';
  import Link from 'next/link';
```

---

These changes should fix the issue. Here's what was happening:

1. In Next.js 13+ with the App Router, all components are server components by default
2. Server components cannot use client-side-only features like:
   - React hooks (`useState`, `useEffect`, etc.)
   - Browser APIs (`window`, `document`, etc.)
   - Event listeners
   - React context (including Redux context)
   - Other client-side libraries

3. The error occurred because:
   - Your Header component was properly marked with 'use client' but had a blank line after it
   - Your Redux provider, which uses Redux (client-only), wasn't marked as a client component
   - Your MainLayout, which imports the Header (a client component), wasn't marked as a client component 
   - Your Footer, which uses `new Date()`, wasn't marked as a client component

I've added the 'use client' directive to all these components, which should resolve the error. The directive must be the very first line in the file with no blank lines after it before the imports.

---

Perfect! I've fixed the import statement for the RoleGuard component.

The error was occurring because:

1. In your RoleGuard.tsx file, the component is exported using `export default RoleGuard;` which means it's a default export.

2. But in your DashboardLayout.tsx file, you were trying to import it as a named export with `import { RoleGuard } from '../auth/RoleGuard';`.

3. The correct way to import a default export is without curly braces: `import RoleGuard from '../auth/RoleGuard';`.

This change should resolve the error. When you see the error message "Export X doesn't exist in target module," it typically means either:
- The export doesn't exist at all in the target file
- You're using a named import for a default export (as in this case)
- You're using a default import for a named export

Another thing to note: I've also added the 'use client' directive at the top of DashboardLayout.tsx since it's using client-side features (React hooks via RoleGuard and useAppSelector).

Read file: lib/auth.ts

---

It seems that we have NextAuth set up, but we're missing an API route for user registration. Let's create it:

---

```diff
- 
+ import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
+ import prisma from '@/lib/prisma';
+ import { hash } from 'bcrypt';
+ import { z } from 'zod';
+ 
+ // Schema validation
+ const userSchema = z.object({
+   firstName: z.string().min(2),
+   lastName: z.string().min(2),
+   email: z.string().email(),
+   password: z.string().min(8),
+ });
+ 
+ export async function POST(request: Request) {
+   try {
+     const body = await request.json();
+     
+     // Validate input data
+     const validation = userSchema.safeParse(body);
+     if (!validation.success) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'Invalid input data', details: validation.error.format() },
+         { status: 400 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     const { firstName, lastName, email, password } = validation.data;
+ 
+     // Check if user already exists
+     const existingUser = await prisma.user.findUnique({
+       where: { email },
+     });
+ 
+     if (existingUser) {
+       return NextResponse.json(
+         { error: 'User with this email already exists' },
+         { status: 409 }
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     // Hash password
+     const hashedPassword = await hash(password, 10);
+     
+     // Create user in database
+     const user = await prisma.user.create({
+       data: {
+         name: `${firstName} ${lastName}`,
+         email,
+         password: hashedPassword,
+         role: 'USER', // Default role
+       },
+     });
+ 
+     // Remove password from response
+     const { password: _, ...userWithoutPassword } = user;
+ 
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { 
+         message: 'User created successfully',
+         user: userWithoutPassword
+       }, 
+       { status: 201 }
+     );
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Registration error:', error);
+     return NextResponse.json(
+       { error: 'Something went wrong' },
+       { status: 500 }
+     );
+   }
+ } 
```

---

```diff
+           firstName: data.firstName,

+         throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to create account');
+       }

+       router.push('/login?registered=true');
      } catch (err) {
+       if (err instanceof Error) {
+         setError(err.message);
+       } else {
          setError('An error occurred. Please try again.');
+       }
        console.error(err);
      } finally {
```

Now we need to create a Redux provider implementation that uses NextAuth:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import { SessionProvider as NextAuthSessionProvider } from 'next-auth/react';
+ import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';
+ 
+ interface SessionProviderProps {
+   children: ReactNode;
+ }
+ 
+ const SessionProvider = ({ children }: SessionProviderProps) => {
+   return <NextAuthSessionProvider>{children}</NextAuthSessionProvider>;
+ };
+ 
+ export default SessionProvider; 
```

---

Now, let's create a component that will sync the NextAuth session with our Redux store:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import React, { useEffect } from 'react';
+ import { useSession } from 'next-auth/react';
+ import { useAppDispatch } from '@/lib/redux/store';
+ import { updateUserFromSession } from '@/lib/redux/slices/authSlice';
+ 
+ interface SessionSyncProviderProps {
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * A component that syncs the NextAuth session with the Redux store
+  */
+ const SessionSyncProvider: React.FC<SessionSyncProviderProps> = ({ children }) => {
+   const { data: session } = useSession();
+   const dispatch = useAppDispatch();
+ 
+   // Update Redux store when session changes
+   useEffect(() => {
+     dispatch(updateUserFromSession(session));
+   }, [session, dispatch]);
+ 
+   return <>{children}</>;
+ };
+ 
+ export default SessionSyncProvider; 
```

---

Finally, let's update the layout file to include our SessionSyncProvider:

---

```diff
  import ReduxProvider from "@/components/providers/ReduxProvider";
  import SessionProvider from "@/components/providers/SessionProvider";
+ import SessionSyncProvider from "@/components/providers/SessionSyncProvider";
  import MainLayout from "@/components/layout/MainLayout";
  
```

```diff
          <SessionProvider>
            <ReduxProvider>
+             <SessionSyncProvider>
                <MainLayout>{children}</MainLayout>
+             </SessionSyncProvider>
            </ReduxProvider>
          </SessionProvider>
```

---

Let's summarize the changes we've made to fix the signup and login functionality:

1. Created a proper API route for user registration (`app/api/auth/register/route.ts`) that creates users in the database using Prisma.

2. Updated the SignupForm to use this registration API instead of simulating it.

3. Updated the LoginForm to use NextAuth's signIn function instead of simulating it.

4. Created a SessionProvider to make NextAuth sessions available throughout the app.

5. Created a SessionSyncProvider to keep the NextAuth session in sync with our Redux store.

6. Updated the authSlice to work with NextAuth by adding a new action to update from the session.

7. Added the 'use client' directive to components like RoleGuard to ensure they work properly in Next.js.

8. Installed necessary dependencies: @next-auth/prisma-adapter, bcrypt, and @types/bcrypt.

9. Ran the Prisma migration to update the database.

These changes should fix the issues with user signup and login. Users will now be properly created in the database when they sign up, and they can log in using the same credentials. The session will be managed by NextAuth and synced with Redux for state management.

---

Finally, let's create an AuthLayout component that provides the necessary authentication providers without including the main layout:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';
+ import SessionProvider from '@/components/providers/SessionProvider';
+ import ReduxProvider from '@/components/providers/ReduxProvider';
+ import SessionSyncProvider from '@/components/providers/SessionSyncProvider';
+ 
+ interface AuthLayoutProps {
+   children: ReactNode;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * A layout component for authentication pages that includes necessary providers
+  * but excludes the header and footer
+  */
+ const AuthLayout: React.FC<AuthLayoutProps> = ({ children }) => {
+   return (
+     <SessionProvider>
+       <ReduxProvider>
+         <SessionSyncProvider>
+           {children}
+         </SessionSyncProvider>
+       </ReduxProvider>
+     </SessionProvider>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default AuthLayout; 
```

Now we have the images in place. The issue should be resolved. Let me summarize the changes I made:

1. Identified that login and signup pages were still inheriting the root layout with MainLayout (which contains the header and footer).

2. Modified the layout files for both login and signup pages to:
   - Override the root layout completely
   - Include their own providers (SessionProvider, ReduxProvider, SessionSyncProvider)
   - Use the same font configuration as the root layout for consistency
   - Create a full HTML document tree that doesn't include MainLayout

3. Updated the login and signup page components to:
   - Remove the AuthLayout wrapper (which was redundant since providers are now in the layout)
   - Directly render the form components

4. Added background images for login and signup:
   - Downloaded nature/mountains image for login background
   - Downloaded nature/desert image for signup background

These changes ensure that the login and signup pages have:
- No header or footer (MainLayout is completely avoided)
- The same beautiful split-screen design as shown in your reference screenshot

- Consistent styling with the rest of the application

The pages should now match the UI in your screenshot exactly without any navigation or footer components on them.

---

Now let's create custom templates for the login and signup pages that include everything they need without using the root layout:

---

```diff
- 
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import { Geist, Geist_Mono } from 'next/font/google';
+ import SessionProvider from '@/components/providers/SessionProvider';
+ import ReduxProvider from '@/components/providers/ReduxProvider';
+ import SessionSyncProvider from '@/components/providers/SessionSyncProvider';
+ 
+ // Fonts
+ const geistSans = Geist({
+   variable: '--font-geist-sans',
+   subsets: ['latin'],
+ });
+ 
+ const geistMono = Geist_Mono({
+   variable: '--font-geist-mono',
+   subsets: ['latin'],
+ });
+ 
+ export default function LoginTemplate({
+   children,
+ }: {
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+ }) {
+   return (
+     <html lang="en">
+       <body className={`${geistSans.variable} ${geistMono.variable} antialiased`}>
+         <SessionProvider>
+           <ReduxProvider>
+             <SessionSyncProvider>
+               {children}
+             </SessionSyncProvider>
+           </ReduxProvider>
+         </SessionProvider>
+       </body>
+     </html>
+   );
+ }
```

---

Since we're still having issues, let's take a more direct approach by removing the MainLayout from these specific routes and creating full standalone pages:

---

```diff
- import LoginForm from '@/components/auth/LoginForm';
+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import React from 'react';
+ import Link from 'next/link';
+ import Image from 'next/image';
+ import { useState } from 'react';
+ import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import { zodResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/zod';
+ import { z } from 'zod';
+ import { useRouter, useSearchParams } from 'next/navigation';
+ import { signIn } from 'next-auth/react';
+ import SessionProvider from '@/components/providers/SessionProvider';
+ import ReduxProvider from '@/components/providers/ReduxProvider';
+ import SessionSyncProvider from '@/components/providers/SessionSyncProvider';
+ import { useAppDispatch } from '@/lib/redux/store';
+ import { loginUser } from '@/lib/redux/slices/authSlice';
+ 
+ // Form schema with Zod
+ const loginSchema = z.object({
+   email: z.string().email('Please enter a valid email'),
+   password: z.string().min(1, 'Password is required'),
+   rememberMe: z.boolean().optional(),
+ });
+ 
+ type LoginFormValues = z.infer<typeof loginSchema>;
  
  export default function LoginPage() {
-   return <LoginForm />;
+   const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
+   const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
+   const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false);
+   const [successMessage, setSuccessMessage] = useState<string | null>(null);
+   const router = useRouter();
+   const searchParams = useSearchParams();
+   const dispatch = useAppDispatch();
+ 
+   // Check if user just registered
+   React.useEffect(() => {
+     const registered = searchParams.get('registered');
+     if (registered === 'true') {
+       setSuccessMessage('Registration successful! Please log in with your new account.');
+     }
+   }, [searchParams]);
+ 
+   const {
+     register,
+     handleSubmit,
+     formState: { errors },
+   } = useForm<LoginFormValues>({
+     resolver: zodResolver(loginSchema),
+     defaultValues: {
+       email: '',
+       password: '',
+       rememberMe: false,
+     },
+   });
+ 
+   const onSubmit = async (data: LoginFormValues) => {
+     try {
+       setIsLoading(true);
+       setError(null);
+       
+       // Use NextAuth for login
+       const result = await signIn('credentials', {
+         redirect: false,
+         email: data.email,
+         password: data.password,
+       });
+       
+       if (result?.error) {
+         throw new Error('Invalid email or password. Please try again.');
+       }
+       
+       if (result?.ok) {
+         // Update Redux state
+         dispatch(loginUser({
+           email: data.email,
+           password: data.password,
+         }));
+         
+         // Redirect to dashboard
+         router.push('/dashboard');
+       }
+     } catch (err) {
+       if (err instanceof Error) {
+         setError(err.message);
+       } else {
+         setError('Invalid email or password. Please try again.');
+       }
+       console.error(err);
+     } finally {
+       setIsLoading(false);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <SessionProvider>
+       <ReduxProvider>
+         <SessionSyncProvider>
+           <div className="flex h-screen">
+             {/* Left Column - Image */}
+             <div className="hidden md:flex w-1/2 bg-indigo-600 relative">
+               <div className="p-6 absolute top-0 left-0 z-10">
+                 <div className="text-white text-2xl font-bold">KlickStock</div>
+               </div>
+               <div className="absolute top-4 right-4 z-10">
+                 <Link 
+                   href="/"
+                   className="flex items-center justify-center space-x-2 text-white bg-white/20 hover:bg-white/30 rounded-full px-4 py-2 transition duration-200"
+                 >
+                   <span>Back to website</span>
+                   <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" className="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
+                     <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M9 5l7 7-7 7" />
+                   </svg>
+                 </Link>
+               </div>
+               <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-b from-indigo-600/30 to-indigo-900/50 z-0"></div>
+               <Image
+                 src="/images/login-bg.jpg"
+                 alt="Login background"
+                 layout="fill"
+                 objectFit="cover"
+                 className="z-0"
+               />
+               <div className="relative z-10 flex flex-col justify-between h-full p-12 text-white">
+                 <div></div>
+                 <div>
+                   <h2 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-2">Capturing Moments,</h2>
+                   <h2 className="text-4xl font-bold">Creating Memories</h2>
+                   <div className="flex space-x-2 mt-6">
+                     <div className="h-1 w-8 bg-white rounded-full"></div>
+                     <div className="h-1 w-8 bg-white rounded-full opacity-50"></div>
+                     <div className="h-1 w-8 bg-white rounded-full opacity-50"></div>
+                   </div>
+                 </div>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* Right Column - Form */}
+             <div className="w-full md:w-1/2 flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-50 px-6">
+               <div className="w-full max-w-md">
+                 <div className="mb-8">
+                   <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Log in</h1>
+                   <p className="text-gray-600">
+                     Don't have an account?{' '}
+                     <Link href="/signup" className="text-indigo-600 hover:underline">
+                       Sign up
+                     </Link>
+                   </p>
+                 </div>
+ 
+                 {error && (
+                   <div className="bg-red-50 text-red-600 p-3 rounded-md mb-4">
+                     {error}
+                   </div>
+                 )}
+ 
+                 {successMessage && (
+                   <div className="bg-green-50 text-green-600 p-3 rounded-md mb-4">
+                     {successMessage}
+                   </div>
+                 )}
+ 
+                 <form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)} className="space-y-4">
+                   <div>
+                     <input
+                       {...register('email')}
+                       id="email"
+                       type="email"
+                       placeholder="Email"
+                       className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-transparent"
+                     />
+                     {errors.email && (
+                       <p className="text-red-600 text-sm mt-1">{errors.email.message}</p>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+ 
+                   <div className="relative">
+                     <input
+                       {...register('password')}
+                       id="password"
+                       type={showPassword ? 'text' : 'password'}
+                       placeholder="Enter your password"
+                       className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 focus:border-transparent"
+                     />
+                     <button
+                       type="button"
+                       className="absolute inset-y-0 right-0 pr-3 flex items-center"
+                       onClick={() => setShowPassword(!showPassword)}
+                     >
+                       {showPassword ? (
+                         <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-500" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
+                           <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M13.875 18.825A10.05 10.05 0 0112 19c-4.478 0-8.268-2.943-9.543-7a9.97 9.97 0 011.563-3.029m5.858.908a3 3 0 114.243 4.243M9.878 9.878l4.242 4.242M9.88 9.88l-3.29-3.29m7.532 7.532l3.29 3.29M3 3l3.59 3.59m0 0A9.953 9.953 0 0112 5c4.478 0 8.268 2.943 9.543 7a10.025 10.025 0 01-4.132 5.411m0 0L21 21" />
+                         </svg>
+                       ) : (
+                         <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" className="h-5 w-5 text-gray-500" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
+                           <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M15 12a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z" />
+                           <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M2.458 12C3.732 7.943 7.523 5 12 5c4.478 0 8.268 2.943 9.542 7-1.274 4.057-5.064 7-9.542 7-4.477 0-8.268-2.943-9.542-7z" />
+                         </svg>
+                       )}
+                     </button>
+                     {errors.password && (
+                       <p className="text-red-600 text-sm mt-1">{errors.password.message}</p>
+                     )}
+                   </div>
+ 
+                   <div className="flex items-center justify-between mt-2">
+                     <div className="flex items-center">
+                       <input
+                         {...register('rememberMe')}
+                         id="rememberMe"
+                         type="checkbox"
+                         className="h-4 w-4 border border-gray-300 rounded bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 text-indigo-600"
+                       />
+                       <label htmlFor="rememberMe" className="ml-2 text-sm text-gray-700">
+                         Remember me
+                       </label>
+                     </div>
+                     <div>
+                       <Link href="/forgot-password" className="text-sm text-indigo-600 hover:underline">
+                         Forgot password?
+                       </Link>
+                     </div>
+                   </div>
+ 
+                   <button
+                     type="submit"
+                     disabled={isLoading}
+                     className="w-full py-3 px-4 bg-indigo-600 hover:bg-indigo-700 text-white font-medium rounded-md transition duration-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 flex justify-center mt-6"
+                   >
+                     {isLoading ? (
+                       <svg className="animate-spin h-5 w-5 text-white" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+                         <circle className="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="4"></circle>
+                         <path className="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path>
+                       </svg>
+                     ) : (
+                       'Log in'
+                     )}
+                   </button>
+ 
+                   <div className="relative my-8">
+                     <div className="absolute inset-0 flex items-center">
+                       <div className="w-full border-t border-gray-300"></div>
+                     </div>
+                     <div className="relative flex justify-center text-sm">
+                       <span className="px-2 bg-gray-50 text-gray-500">Or login with</span>
+                     </div>
+                   </div>
+ 
+                   <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4">
+                     <button
+                       type="button"
+                       className="py-3 px-4 border border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm bg-white text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 flex items-center justify-center"
+                     >
+                       <svg className="h-5 w-5 mr-2" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
+                         <g transform="matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 27.009001, -39.238998)">
+                           <path fill="#4285F4" d="M -3.264 51.509 C -3.264 50.719 -3.334 49.969 -3.454 49.239 L -14.754 49.239 L -14.754 53.749 L -8.284 53.749 C -8.574 55.229 -9.424 56.479 -10.684 57.329 L -10.684 60.329 L -6.824 60.329 C -4.564 58.239 -3.264 55.159 -3.264 51.509 Z"/>
+                           <path fill="#34A853" d="M -14.754 63.239 C -11.514 63.239 -8.804 62.159 -6.824 60.329 L -10.684 57.329 C -11.764 58.049 -13.134 58.489 -14.754 58.489 C -17.884 58.489 -20.534 56.379 -21.484 53.529 L -25.464 53.529 L -25.464 56.619 C -23.494 60.539 -19.444 63.239 -14.754 63.239 Z"/>
+                           <path fill="#FBBC05" d="M -21.484 53.529 C -21.734 52.809 -21.864 52.039 -21.864 51.239 C -21.864 50.439 -21.724 49.669 -21.484 48.949 L -21.484 45.859 L -25.464 45.859 C -26.284 47.479 -26.754 49.299 -26.754 51.239 C -26.754 53.179 -26.284 54.999 -25.464 56.619 L -21.484 53.529 Z"/>
+                           <path fill="#EA4335" d="M -14.754 43.989 C -12.984 43.989 -11.404 44.599 -10.154 45.789 L -6.734 42.369 C -8.804 40.429 -11.514 39.239 -14.754 39.239 C -19.444 39.239 -23.494 41.939 -25.464 45.859 L -21.484 48.949 C -20.534 46.099 -17.884 43.989 -14.754 43.989 Z"/>
```
